item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Please consider the following:

[ul][li]Add explanations or this is not a tutorial. If you don’t want to explain, consider moving this to the snippets section.[/li]
[li]Consider working on your conventions.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Dungeoneering Emote PI - Erasedpkz Compatable!

item.title: Adding Dungeoneering Emote PI - Erasedpkz Compatable!
item.dc:creator: @ggaeth ggaeth
item.description:
@ggaeth wrote:

[quote=“xxifish i x, post:1, topic:400137”][center][size=14pt]Hello guys welcome to my first ever tutorial in general!! today i just added my Dungeoneering skillcape Emote! with mastercape only!

  1. Find you current Case 154 in the clickingbuttons.java file!
    and replace with this![/size][/center]

case 154: if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.logoutDelay < 8000) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do skillcape emotes in combat!"); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastEmote >= 7000) { if(c.getPA().wearingCape(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])) { c.stopMovement(); c.gfx0(c.getPA().skillcapeGfx(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); c.startAnimation(c.getPA().skillcapeEmote(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19710) { c.getPA().dungemote(c); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be wearing a Skillcape to do this emote."); } c.lastEmote = System.currentTimeMillis(); } break;

[center]2) Next what you want to do is go to you playerassistant.java folder and add
[/center] public void dungemote(final Client c) { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { int dungtime = 16; public void execute(EventContainer dung) { if (dungtime == 16) { c.gfx0(2442); c.startAnimation(13190); } if (dungtime == 15) { c.npcId2 = 11228; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13192); } if (dungtime == 10) { c.npcId2 = 11227; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13193); } if (dungtime == 6) { c.gfx0(2442); } if (dungtime == 5) { c.npcId2 = 11229; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13194); } if (dungtime == 0) { c.isNpc = false; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (c == null || dungtime <= 0) { dung.stop(); return; } if (dungtime >= 0) { dungtime--; } } }, 600); }

[center]make sure you save both files OFC and compile you should get 0% error cause ijust added it like 5 mins ago lol!
if there was a guide to make dungeoneering emote for PI then sorry just felt the need to post this shit up! THIS IS COMPATIBLE WITH ERASEDPKZ (im using erasedpkz)
ENJOY your new dungeoneering emote!
19709 - Dungeoneering master cape[/center]

[center]Hope this guide has helped you out! feel free to REP if you want to
thanks again!!
Fish[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]ill edit pic to be a shit lot better quality when i hop on laptop
ENJOY![/center]
[size=18pt][center]IF YOU WANT TO START A NEW SERVER I RECOMEND TORVAPKZ CAUSE ALL U GOTTA DO IT CHANGE CLASS 154 AND ADD THE LAST CODE PART [/center][/size][/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Dungeoneering Emote PI - Erasedpkz Compatable!

[quote=“xxifish i x, post:1, topic:400137”][center][size=14pt]Hello guys welcome to my first ever tutorial in general!! today i just added my Dungeoneering skillcape Emote! with mastercape only!

  1. Find you current Case 154 in the clickingbuttons.java file!
    and replace with this![/size][/center]

case 154: if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.logoutDelay < 8000) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do skillcape emotes in combat!"); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastEmote >= 7000) { if(c.getPA().wearingCape(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])) { c.stopMovement(); c.gfx0(c.getPA().skillcapeGfx(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); c.startAnimation(c.getPA().skillcapeEmote(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19710) { c.getPA().dungemote(c); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be wearing a Skillcape to do this emote."); } c.lastEmote = System.currentTimeMillis(); } break;

[center]2) Next what you want to do is go to you playerassistant.java folder and add
[/center] public void dungemote(final Client c) { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { int dungtime = 16; public void execute(EventContainer dung) { if (dungtime == 16) { c.gfx0(2442); c.startAnimation(13190); } if (dungtime == 15) { c.npcId2 = 11228; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13192); } if (dungtime == 10) { c.npcId2 = 11227; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13193); } if (dungtime == 6) { c.gfx0(2442); } if (dungtime == 5) { c.npcId2 = 11229; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13194); } if (dungtime == 0) { c.isNpc = false; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (c == null || dungtime <= 0) { dung.stop(); return; } if (dungtime >= 0) { dungtime--; } } }, 600); }

[center]make sure you save both files OFC and compile you should get 0% error cause ijust added it like 5 mins ago lol!
if there was a guide to make dungeoneering emote for PI then sorry just felt the need to post this shit up! THIS IS COMPATIBLE WITH ERASEDPKZ (im using erasedpkz)
ENJOY your new dungeoneering emote!
19709 - Dungeoneering master cape[/center]

[center]Hope this guide has helped you out! feel free to REP if you want to
thanks again!!
Fish[/center]

[center][/center]
[center]ill edit pic to be a shit lot better quality when i hop on laptop
ENJOY![/center]
[size=18pt][center]IF YOU WANT TO START A NEW SERVER I RECOMEND TORVAPKZ CAUSE ALL U GOTTA DO IT CHANGE CLASS 154 AND ADD THE LAST CODE PART [/center][/size][/quote] dude u know how shit this crap is got 1 error i just need to know wats the normal case 154! cuz ur case 154 got me error in compiler and i want to know original case 154! please tell me it.

item.title: Adding Dungeoneering Emote PI - Erasedpkz Compatable!
item.dc:creator: @ricardoxkill ricardoxkill
item.description:
@ricardoxkill wrote:

Uhh Where at playerassistent.java i need to add this code than i put it some where but than i got errors

public void dungemote(final Client c) {
EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
int dungtime = 16;
public void execute(EventContainer dung) {
if (dungtime == 16) {
c.gfx0(2442);
c.startAnimation(13190);
}
if (dungtime == 15) {
c.npcId2 = 11228;
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.startAnimation(13192);
}
if (dungtime == 10) {
c.npcId2 = 11227;
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.startAnimation(13193);
}
if (dungtime == 6) {
c.gfx0(2442);
}
if (dungtime == 5) {
c.npcId2 = 11229;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.startAnimation(13194);
}
if (dungtime == 0) {
c.isNpc = false;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (c == null || dungtime <= 0) {
dung.stop();
return;
}
if (dungtime >= 0) {
dungtime–;
}
}
}, 600);
}

Read full topic
